entry.title: Community Code of Conduct
entry.content:
The N3N community code are the collection of 4-clause, easy to follow guidelines to always remember with a smile.

All the N3N project follows the N3N Code of Conduct.

Instances of abusive, harassing, or any type of unacceptable behaviour may be reported by contacting the N3N Discipline Committee via coc@n3n.org.

entry.title: Code of Conduct
entry.content:
The N3N code of conduct are the collection of 4-clause, easy to follow guidelines to always remember with a smile.

Code

  • Do your best
  • Become better version of yourself
  • Be good to fellow members
  • Adhere to N3N's philosophy

Contact

This code of conduct should be treated as a guide, not as the law itself. For any kind of unacceptable behaviour, write to us at coc@n3n.org
